Draft Rating:

A-

Randy Pfund ranks in the 81th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Pfund's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 9 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Dwyane Wade with 5th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Ken Johnson with 49th pick but was worth 17th pick.
  • Drafted Eddie House with 37th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Michael Beasley with 2th pick but was worth 49th pick.
  • Drafted Caron Butler with 10th pick but was worth 25th pick.

Trade Rating:

D-

Randy Pfund ranks in the 20th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Ricky Davis, Dale Ellis, Eddie Jones, Anthony Mason to MIA.
  • Lost P.J. Brown, Rodney Buford, Tim James, Jamal Mashburn, Otis Thorpe to CHH.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Shaquille O'Neal to MIA.
  • Lost Caron Butler, Brian Grant, Lamar Odom, Jordan Farmar, Renaldas Seibutis to LAL.

Signing Rating:

C

Randy Pfund ranks in the 51th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database. That's basically average. It could be worse though lol.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Dwyane Wade in 2006.
  • Signed Lamar Odom in 2003.
  • Signed Damon Jones in 2004.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Udonis Haslem in 2003.
  • Signed Anthony Carter in 1999.
  • Signed Malik Allen in 2001.
